molSimplify.python_nn.tf_ANN.get_error_params(latent_distances, errors)[source]¶

Get the maximum-likelihood parameters for an error model N(a+b*(latent_distance)). Inputs: latent_distances (vector), errors (vector) Output: [a, b]
